features: Helps wipe away dirt and germs
body.description: Johnson’s Hand & Face Wipes Gently and effectively clean your baby’s delicate hands and face with Johnson's Baby Hand & Face Wipes. These baby wipes remove over 95% of dirt and germs and come in a handy re-sealable package for on-the-go cleansing. The No More Tears formula is as gentle to eyes as pure water. These baby wipes are paraben and alcohol-free and allergy-tested. Directions: Use anytime, anywhere to gently wipe away dirt and germs. Johnson’s hand & face wipes are great for gentle cleansing when on the go.Johnson’s hand & face wipes provide gentle on-the-go cleansing for baby’s delicate face and hands. Discard after use.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Johnson’s Safety Above All At Johnson’s, we believe nothing is more important than your baby’s safety. Every product we make is a carefully blended combination of high quality ingredients that ensure the product is safe and best for baby and can be trusted to work just the way it is intended to, and the way moms expect it to. As one of the best baby skin care brand around the world, we are also one of the leaders in safety research. And we do all this so you can have peace of mind when using our products, and focus on what matters most, your baby’s healthy development.

Johnson’s Hand & Face Wipes Gently and effectively clean your baby’s delicate hands and face with Johnson's Baby Hand & Face Wipes. These baby wipes remove over 95% of dirt and germs and come in a handy re-sealable package for on-the-go cleansing. The No More Tears formula is as gentle to eyes as pure water. These baby wipes are paraben and alcohol-free and allergy-tested. Directions: Use anytime, anywhere to gently wipe away dirt and germs. Johnson’s hand & face wipes are great for gentle cleansing when on the go.Johnson’s hand & face wipes provide gentle on-the-go cleansing for baby’s delicate face and hands. Discard after use. At a Glance: 25 disposable baby hand and face wipes Gently and effectively removes dirt and germs from baby’s delicate hands and face Helps wipe away over 95% of dirt and germs Convenient re-sealable package Alcohol-free, paraben-free, and allergy-tested wipes No More Tears formula is as gentle on baby’s eyes as pure water
About Johnson’s Brand At the Johnson's Brand, we’re here for every happy, messy, exhausting and amazing moment of life with your baby. And all the wondrous changes parenthood brings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wipes and they smell great!
reviews.reviewText: I love these. They smell good and it cleans off dirt and magic marker easily from the skin. I also carry a pack of these in my bag and purse in case I need to fresh up my face or body. They are great for taking off makeup or to refresh up after a long day. They are gentle on sensative skin. If I am unable to clean my toddlers face at bath, this is my substitute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refreshing, Gentle, Odorless
reviews.reviewText: Hard to find these wipes locally. They are the best for wiping summer sweat from one's brow. I keep a pack in my tote for work or running errands as well as a pack in my car. Refreshing. No odor. Very gentle on face. Also like the fact that it is made in the UK! Trustworthy product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for diaper bag!
reviews.reviewText: I love to keep a pack of these in the diaper bag. They’re great for on-the-go or a quick face-wipe before going in public. They are soft, durable, cloth-like, and smell very nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the product
reviews.reviewText: They are soft, and worth the price and clean the face and hands very well for the little ones! Use them all the time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for little hands on the go
reviews.reviewText: Great for on the go with little ones. The size is smaller than a normal wipe which we like and they seem more gentle too. I prefer some of the other brands that use natural extracts instead of chemicals, but my wife likes these because they don't foam and have less scent. They are also small enough to fit in a small bag in case you are trying to downgrade from the huge diaper bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have for every mom!
reviews.reviewText: LOVE this! I'm ordering on subscribe and she bc we use so often w my 8 mo old. After every meal, whether home or out, we use em to clean him up. Smells wonderful, not harsh at all and we can scrub his entire face, mouth area, hands and body without him being affected. Dries well also. We had been getting boogie wipes and they leave a very sticky residue so we dropped boogie wipes and went back to these. Wonderful for his runny noise when sick as well. Will be giving these to other new moms as shower gifts!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2013
reviews.reviewText: I was gifted this brand of wipes at my baby shower, and fell in love with them on day one of use.Smaller than baby wipes, and with a gentler solution, they are perfect for cleaning up little hands and faces during meal and snack times. My daughter loves them as we'll and will not hesitate to grab the yellow pack whenever a mess pops up (she's 21m old).I am thrilled to find this product available for bulk purchase. With one and one due days away, it is a load off my mind to know such a great product is available at an equally great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, great scent and great for crawlers. I wipe my daughter’s hands after her play, crawling time. I love these wipes. I wish each package brought more than 25 wipes. Great for travel.
